item.title: A summer stuck in Thailand
item.description: Hua Hin After spending several months in Bangkok, we decided to leave the city for the sleepy beach town of Hua Hin about 3 hours south. The following episodes document our monthlong stay. Part 1 Part 2 Part 3 Part 4 Part 5 Part 6
